text: Pen nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb. Bɨ ogɨnap gos kɨli ak nep nɨbop takaw yepɨs agɨl, takaw yokɨp yokɨp agɨnɨgabal ak, takaw anɨb ak gos nɨbi ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Nɨgenɨgabɨm, nɨbop tunɨg wos yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabal. Bɨ anɨb okok, kɨli napɨs nased takaw kɨli ke anep nɨŋɨd, kɨcheki tap anɨb okok takaw agɨlak ak nɨŋɨd dɨpal. Klays takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ne ak ma nɨŋɨd dɨpal.
